name: Homeworld
description:
Homeworld is a strategy game developed by Relic Entertainment. It was originally released in 1999. It was published by Sierra On-Line. Homeworld has a Metascore of 93, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Homeworld on PC.
It was produced by Curtis Terry. It was directed by Alex Garden. Paul Ruskay scored the game.
